120
The Shining Empire was the greatest empire
The Shining Empire had wealth
The Shining Empire had safety
The Shining Empire had peace
The Shining Empire had no Gods

texts.translation:
121 : 128
The Shining King ruled the Shining Empire
The Shining King was the greatest person
The Shining King met with the beautiful Gloomy Queen
The Shining King and the Gloomy Queen had many children
The Shining King was happy

texts.translation:
129 . 1
The four Gods crossed the darkest ocean
The four Gods entered the Shining Empire
The four Gods met with the Shining King

The Gods are immortal
The Shining King was not immortal
The Shining King was lesser than the Gods
The Shining King was not happy
The Shining King wanted to become immortal

texts.translation:
130 . 1
The God of Thorns was generous but intimidating
The God of Metal was confident but hateful
The God of Fire was loving but rageful 
The God of the Abyss was wise but deceitful

130 . 2
The four Gods blessed some people
But the four Gods punished some people
Many people worshipped the four Gods
The Shining King agreed to worship the four Gods

131 . 1
The Shining King built a temple to the four Gods
The Shining King asked the four Gods to become immortal
But the four Gods were not happy

texts.translation:
131 . 2
The four Gods wanted to cross the darkest ocean again
The four Gods required sacrifices
In order to cross the darkest ocean
The four Gods promised that if Shining King were to offer sacrifices
Then the Shining King would become immortal

texts.translation:
132 : 135
The Shining King made many traps inside the temple
A one-named explorer chose to enter the temple and offer sacrifice
The Shining King again asked the four Gods to become immortal
The four Gods were still not happy
The four Gods still required more sacrifices

136 . 2
The Shining King met the intimidating explorer Oracle of the Ocean
The Oracle of the Ocean intimidated many strong citizens
The Oracle of the Ocean told them to choose to enter the temple and sacrifice themselves
Many citizens sacrificed themselves and the Oracle of the Ocean chose to enter the temple
But the God of Thorns protected the Oracle of the Ocean
The four Gods were still not happy
The four Gods still required more sacrifices

139 . 2
The Shining King met the confident explorer, the Faithful Architect
The Faithful Architect placed a lot of coins into the temple
The greediest citizens chose to enter the temple as sacrifices
Many citizens sacrificed themselves and the Faithful Architect chose to enter the temple
But the God of Metal protected the Faithful Architect
The four Gods were still not happy
The four Gods still required more sacrifices

texts.translation:
144 . 2
The Shining King put his own crown into the temple
The Shining King told the explorer, the Crowned Warrior, to retrieve the crown
The most envious citizens chose to enter the temple as sacrifices
Many citizens sacrificed themselves and the Crowned Warrior chose to enter the temple
But the God of Fire protected the Crowned Warrior
The four Gods were still not happy
The four Gods still demanded more sacrifices

texts.translation:
148
The Shining King asked the God of the Abyss for an answer
The God of the Abyss replied to him to gather those who fear death
The God of the Abyss put many relics into the temple
The God of the Abyss put the gift of immortality inside one relic
The citizens most afraid of death chose to enter the temple as sacrifices
Many citizens sacrificed themselves and the Gods were finally happy

texts.translation:
149 . 1
The four Gods should have crossed the darkest ocean again
But the God of the Abyss betrayed the other three Gods
The God of the Abyss wanted to gather the sacrifices and consume everything
The Oracle of the Ocean saw and warned the three Gods
The Faithful Architect set a God trap inside the temple
The Crowned Warrior deceived the God of the Abyss into entering the trap
The God of the Abyss was imprisoned in the temple and consumed nothing
But every sacrifice was for naught

texts.translation:
149 . 2
The three explorers had protected the three Gods and the three Gods were happy
The God of Thorns made the Oracle of the Ocean greater
The Oracle of the Ocean became the Eye of Agony
The God of Metal made the Faithful Architect greater
The Faithful Architect became the Masked Defiler
The God of Fire made the Crowned Warrior greater
The Crowned Warrior became the Devouring Rage
The three Gods guarded the temple and the imprisoned God of the Abyss

texts.translation:
149 . 3
The Shining King had given the greatest sacrifice
The Shining King asked three Gods again to become immortal
The three Gods told him that the gift of immortality was now inside a relic
And that relic is now in the deepest part of the temple
The Shining King needed to enter the temple and survive
The Shining King needed to retrieve the relic
But The Shining King was now old
An old person will never survive a temple
The Shining King was angry and sad

texts.translation:
150 : 154
The Shining King now wanted his heirs to retrieve the relic
The Gloomy Queen begged the heirs to not enter the temple and become a sacrifice
The Shining King and his heirs ignored the Gloomy Queen
All of the King's children entered the temple
And all of the King's grandchildren entered the temple
But no child nor grandchild survived

155 . 1
The Gloomy Queen retrieved the Shining Heir who was the last heir of their grandchildren
But the Shining King detained the Gloomy Queen
The Shining King imprisoned the Gloomy Queen
And the Shining King took back the Shining Heir 
The Shining Prince agreed to enter the temple
But the Shining Heir never returned

texts.translation:
155 . 2
The three Gods still needed many more sacrifices
But many more was more than there were people in the whole Shining Empire
The three Gods that if the Shining King sacrificed everything
Then his life span would truly become immortal

texts.translation:
156 : 177
The relic will attract many sacrifices for many years
The Shining King expanded the one temple into many temples
Then the Shining King expanded the many temples into the Phantom Abyss
The Shining King forced all the citizens to choose between torture or entering the temples
The Shining Kingdom became ruin and ash

texts.translation:
178
old Gloomy Queen chose to not enter the temples
But the Shining King loved the Gloomy Queen
The Shining King did not torture the Gloomy Queen
The Shining King freed the Gloomy Queen
But the Gloomy Queen ended up feeling rage and sorrow
The Gloomy Queen took the King's Blade
The Gloomy Queen Learned that the king killed all his descendants and destroyed the Kingdom
So the Gloomy Queen ended up choosing to die outside the temple
Line 10: The death of the Gloomy Queen was not a sacrifice

179 . 1
The Shining King ruined his soul
The Shining King ended up oppressive and hateful
The Shining King ignored the body of the Gloomy Queen
The Shining King crawled into the temple
The God of the Abyss met the Shining King inside the temple

179 . 2
The God of the Abyss told the King three (?)
The last offspring of the Shining Prince had been born
Death inside the temple never ends
If the relic of immortality is retrieved then the God of the Abyss will be released from hell
The Shining King wrote down inside the temple the final story and was sacrificed
